oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Is a naked platinum nanocatalyst better than the analogous supported catalysts?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHOWDHURY, AD
BHADURI, S
LAHIRI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: DYNAMIC KINETIC RESOLUTION
ENANTIOSELECTIVE HYDROGENATION
SECONDARY ALCOHOLS
ACTIVATED KETONES
NANOPARTICLES
WATER
TRANSESTERIFICATION
NANOCRYSTALS
CINCHONIDINE
RACEMIZATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The performance of naked nanocatalyst 1, derived from Chini cluster ([Pt-15(CO)(30)](2-)), has been evaluated with special reference to the analogous catalysts 2 and 3 which were derived from the same [Pt-15(CO)(30)](2-) but supported by MCM-41 and the water soluble polymer PDADMAC, respectively.
